Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, that was an awesome concert! I kinda
wanna learn how to play an instrument, now.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've heard that song they played somewhere
before. What was it called again?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haha...I know this is just a regular town event
and all, but coming with you makes it feel like
we're on a date. I'm a-okay with that. ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's just some music, but because I'm listening
to it with you, it's a hundred times more fun
than just listening to it alone.
<PAGE>
Man, that's the power of love for ya! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I just had the coolest idea! Let's all
learn how to play instruments together, as a
family!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And once we're all good enough, we can put on
concerts together!
<PAGE>
Don't you think a family concert would be loads
of fun? I think we'd really draw out the
hometown crowds.
<PAGE>
And we'd grow even closer together while we
were doing it. That sounds pretty great, huh?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, I think I'm gonna sleep like a baby tonight!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Huh? I sleep like a baby every night? Well...not
every night.
<PAGE>
I mean, when you're out working late, I get all
lonely and worried lying in bed by myself. I can
only rest easy once you get back.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's something unique about hearing a live
musical performance. You pick up so many
small things that recordings don't capture.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's songs were well-chosen. I wonder who
was in charge of arranging the set list.
<PAGE>
Given the concerts I have heard here, I think that
person and I have similar tastes.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's concert was lovely. Though I admit, it
may seem particularly so because I heard it with
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You looked like you were really enjoying yourself,
<MYNAME>. Are you a fan of music?
<PAGE>
If you're interested, I have a collection of records
at home. Next time we decide to have an at-
home date, we can listen to them together.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And if we're at home, we can engage in
some...other activities as well. Hm? Like what?
You'll just have to come visit and see.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This may just be another town event, but it's still
nice to spend an afternoon listening to pleasant
music and relaxing with the family.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Watching how skillfully these musicians perform
makes me think it may be good to have our
children learn to play an instrument.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was some nice music. If they ever released
an album, I'd probably buy it. I wonder if any
shops around here would stock it...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a great concert. I like playing
instruments myself, but for me, it's more
like...just a hobby, I guess.
<PAGE>
But listening to them jam like that reminded me
how much more practice I need before I'm good
enough to play in front of an audience.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If only this wasn't a formal town function, we
could've pretended it was a date and held hands.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I know, I know! Small town, everybody would
stare, etcetera. That's why I didn't.
<PAGE>
Personally, I wouldn't care about all the
gawking, but...you probably wouldn't like the
extra attention, huh?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, were you starting to doze off a little
there?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you were feeling sleepy, you could've leaned
on my shoulder, y'know.
<PAGE>
Don't worry. Even if other people saw us, they
wouldn't realize you were sleeping. They'd just
think we were cuddling.
<PAGE>
Of course, I guess that depends on which
embarrasses you more: being caught sleeping,
or public cuddling!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You haven't learned how to play an instrument
before, right <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I could teach you, if you want. I'm no concert-
level performer, that's for sure, but I can at least
show you the basics.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Having little mini-concerts just with the family
on our days off sounds like fun. Though, it's all
up to you.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a pretty nice concert. This whole
afternoon's been so relaxing that I shouldn't have
any problems sleeping tonight.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's concert was quite good. I had a
wonderful time performing.
<PAGE>
I very much appreciate cultured, artistic events
like these.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I think we all played rather well today, despite
none of us being professional musicians.
<PAGE>
Our performance was quite splendid, far from
what one would expect from a small-town
concert -- in a good way, of course.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's concert was certainly lovely, wasn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I had ample opportunity to watch you from the
stage, blissfully enjoying the music.
<PAGE>
You look so adorable when you're totally focused
on something.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look like you're still enjoying the music,
even now that the concert is over.
<PAGE>
While I admit your expression is exceptionally
adorable and I love seeing it, do remember you're
speaking with me.
<PAGE>
When we talk, I'm not fond of you getting
distracted and focusing on things other than
me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So before I decide to do something scandalous
to pull your attention back to the present, please
regain your focus.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone performed beautifully today. By the
way, have you ever thought about playing an
instrument, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You're quite dexterous with your hands, so I
think you could become a good musician, given
a knowledgeable teacher.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Me? I wouldn't mind instructing you, no. But be
warned, I am a strict teacher.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Though for you, I might go a little softer on you
than I would otherwise.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the future, I think I would like to teach my
children how to play the cello.
<PAGE>
It's said that learning how to play an instrument
even helps boost other parts of the mind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And besides, don't you think that would be a
wonderful way to spend more time with our
children?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you enjoy today's concert?
<PAGE>
That's wonderful. When it comes to stringed
instruments, I have confidence that I can put on
a pleasant performance.
<PAGE>
Though I must admit, performing in front of an
audience this large did have me a bit nervous,
initially.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I noticed you watching me throughout the
whole performance. Was my playing that
entertaining?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you think so, then I'll declare today's concert
worthwhile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Personally, I missed not being able to sit and
experience it with you.
<PAGE>
However, I'm satisfied to know that I
commanded the whole of your attention for the
entire concert.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>With benefits like that, becoming a professional
musician doesn't seem to be that bad of an idea!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you enjoy today?
<PAGE>
Personally, I was a touch nervous at the thought
of playing in front of an audience this large...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But since you were listening to me play so
intently, I was able to relax and play my best.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...YAAAAAAWN... Ugh, I'm sleepy. This kind of
music ain't really my style.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You started looking sleepy there in the middle,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Me too. What say during next year's concert, the
two of us sneak out and go somewhere by
ourselves?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...YAAAWN... Man, I'm tired. Hnn? I didn't listen
to the music at all?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>How could I, with you right next to me?
<PAGE>
Besides, it's because you said you wanted to
come with me and listen to the concert today
that I missed out on a great chance to nap--
<PAGE>
Augh! N-never mind! Forget what I said, I'm just
gonna go home and sleep!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh, so sleepy... What's the point of concerts
like this, anyway?
<PAGE>
Hn? To promote quiet, restful sleep? Why bother
with that? All I need for a good night's sleep is
you in my arms--
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>H-HEY! What do you think you're doing, tricking
me into sayin' that out loud?! I-I don't really, uh,
er, A-ANYWAY! We're goin' home!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you're drooling.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Just kidding. But you did look like you were
starting to doze off.
<PAGE>
I'm surprised you came to this thing, if you
knew it'd just put you to sleep. Me, I wouldn't
bother if I wasn't with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Hn? Why don't I mind coming if it's with you?
Well...we've been together long enough, so you
should know.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've got a lot of respect for people who know
how to play instruments. Today's concert was
great.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I really liked that one last song. Did you happen
to remember what it's called?
<PAGE>
Maybe I should ask one of the musicians later.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a great concert. I'm glad I got to come
and listen to it with you.
<PAGE>
I never realized just how much better music
sounds when you're listening to it with someone
you like.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I wasn't really able to concentrate on the music.
Partway through, I got distracted by the people
staring at us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know people probably aren't staring as much as
I imagine they are, but still...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I don't know why, but I'm embarrassed at the
thought of people catching me fawning over
you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, what do you think of both of us
starting to learn an instrument together?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I think we could totally do it. And not just that,
we could have family performances!
<PAGE>
In fact, I think I could get pretty good at it, if it
meant I could play for you.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With events like these, we get a chance to
mingle with the people from town...
<PAGE>
And if we come as a family, we get to spend
time together and bond. That's pretty cool.
<PAGE>
When I was single, I never really thought much
about these kinds of events, but now I
understand why they're such a good idea.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We did rather well today, I think. Certainly well
enough for a small-town performance for the
common folk.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We were certainly no first-rate orchestra, but I
think it was lovely enough. I expect I will have a
restful night's sleep.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I had a lovely time playing in the concert today.
Something like this is a nice change of pace. A
different sort of date, if you will.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You look like you so enjoyed listening to the
concert that I couldn't help but have fun too.
<PAGE>
Whenever I'm with you, listening to music -- or
anything, really -- somehow seems much more
exciting. It's so strange.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today was quite amusing. You should try
playing an instrument yourself, someday. I
would even teach you, if you'd like.
<PAGE>
You're quite dexterous, so I think you'd have little
difficulty picking up a few simple piano tunes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Then we could put on concerts as a family.
Wouldn't that be fun? I think we should!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's concert was excellent. I had a wonderful
time playing.
<PAGE>
Tonight, I think the spirit of the music and the
pleasant tiredness from my performing will
ensure I get a night of restful sleep.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And if I would have you sleeping next to me, the
night would be perfect.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>In other words, <MYNAME>, no staying out late
to work tonight. I would like you home in time
to go to bed with me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My performance today was excellent, was it
not?
<PAGE>
I have been taught both piano and violin by
renowned music teachers ever since I was little.
I'm quite confident in my skill.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Knowing that you would be here listening to me
play made me much more nervous than I should
have been.
<PAGE>
That is highly unusual. I have never been
nervous about performing for others before.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness, <MYNAME>. You looked like you
were fully absorbed in my performance.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ohohohoho! It is pleasant enough to sit with you
and enjoy lovely music...
<PAGE>
But to stand on stage and watch your dreamy
gaze as you're enraptured by my music is its
own special privilege.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a lovely concert. The song selection made
for a great set today, don't you think?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks to the lovely music, this was a very
pleasant afternoon. I should thank the
performers later.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a lovely concert. Of course, spending it
with you may have made it an even better time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Before dating you, I never knew how beautiful
music could be when you share it with someone
you care about.
<PAGE>
It seems like the idea that people in love
experience life differently isn't just a well-worn
romance novel trope.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You looked a little drowsy during today's
performance, <MYNAME>. Ohoho, no hiding it! I
can tell.
<PAGE>
Your daily work is very tiring, and music has a
relaxing effect on people. It's no wonder you'd
be tempted to nod off.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>And besides, you looked so adorable as you
valiantly attempted to fight off the sandman. It
was amusing to just watch you.
<PAGE>
If this had been a simple date, and not a public
function, I would've let you rest your head on
my knees.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a lovely concert. It made me want to pick
up an instrument again, for the first time in
years.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, why don't we play something
together? It's fine if you don't know how to play
an instrument, I'll teach you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I think we could make beautiful music, playing
together as a family. Wouldn't that be fun?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think it's a good idea for children to learn
music. Perhaps the piano or violin, at first. What
do you think, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Hm? It's too soon to think of that? Oh come
now. The time might come sooner than you
think.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that was a great concert! I really loved the
chance to get up and play for everyone.
<PAGE>
These concerts are so much fun! It's a shame
we only get to do them once a year.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I'm playing, my body will suddenly start
swaying with the music. That's a totally natural
thing, though.
<PAGE>
I mean, even little babies who don't know how
to talk will move around when they hear music
they like.
<PAGE>
It's like jiving is in our DNA, you know? I'm
totally sure of it!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ohmigosh, my heart was pounding so hard I
couldn't hear anything else.
<PAGE>
Ah! I-I'm not sick, though. Honest! I'm fine!
Don't worry!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a great concert. Though maybe it
seems like it was better than usual because you
were there listening.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>W-wait, never mind! I-it was nothing! Anyway!
This was a great concert, and I think we should
come together again next year, too.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a fun concert. I'm so glad we got to attend
together as a family. Let's do it again next year!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, is it me, or did you start nodding
off in the middle?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee...You actually looked really cute, fighting
off the sleepies. I had to try hard not to laugh.
<PAGE>
Still, while coming to town to socialize is
important, you really shouldn't push yourself if
you're too tired.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you enjoy the concert? I hope you had fun.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Um, wh-what did you think of my performance?
Was it okay? See, um, I really don't remember
what happened after around halfway through...
<PAGE>
I mean, you were staring at me so hard! I-I can't
concentrate when you do that.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Everyone looks like they had a good time. That's
great! That makes playing today that much more
worth it.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thanks for being there for me while
I was so busy practicing for the concert.
<PAGE>
Your help let me concentrate on what I needed
to do. I'm really grateful for that.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a nice concert. All the musicians'
fingers moved so smoothly and quickly, it was
pretty to watch.
<PAGE>
How long did they have to practice to get that
good at playing an instrument?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a really nice concert! I wish I could
have brought some animal friends along to listen
to it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a good concert! I want to learn how to
play an instrument myself now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But my hands are all worn and dirty from taking
care of animals all day. They don't really look like
musicians' hands.
<PAGE>
So maybe when I try to learn, I won't be able to
play as prettily as they do.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What? Your hands get all dirty and beat up at
work too? Then...I guess that makes us the
same.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee...! That's right. Our hands are proof that
we both work really hard at what we do.
<PAGE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I think I might like these
tough, dirty hands of mine a little more now.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really liked today's concert!
<PAGE>
It was like we came here together on a nice
date. Let's do it again next year! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, why don't we both learn how to
play an instrument together?
<PAGE>
I just had a dream where we got to play in a
concert like this for everyone, but as a family!
<PAGE>
Wouldn't it be so neat if we could make that
dream come true? I want to give it a shot!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The songs in today's concert were so nice I
started feeling sleepy in the middle.
<PAGE>
Once we get home, how about we take an
afternoon nap?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Sometimes, spending a lazy afternoon together
doing nothing much at all is a good change of
pace. ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was a nice concert. Even though it's over, I
feel as though I can still hear the music.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was such a wonderful performance, you
wouldn't think the musicians were all amateurs. I
quickly found myself lost in their music.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's strange. I have been to many concerts
before...
<PAGE>
But coming to one with you made the music
sound so much more moving and beautiful.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you enjoy Lillie's performance?
<PAGE>
Er, nothing. I just noticed you looking at her
often during the concert...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wh-what are you talking about? I am not
jealous!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's nice to spend the occasional afternoon
enjoying music together.
<PAGE>
Since both of us work, we have a scant few
chances to go out and spend time together as a
family.
<PAGE>
I'm glad this concert gives us one of those rare
chances.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That was an excellent concert. I feel wonderfully
relaxed now. I think I'll have no problem sleeping
well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Though, er...seeing your peacefully sleeping face
every night is a fairly reliable source of pleasant
dreams.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what it feels like to play music.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I have no talent for music, so I couldn't say,
myself. Based on my observations of the
performers, it must feel pretty good.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear a lot of people saying they'd like to learn
how to play an instrument now.
<PAGE>
If they all follow through on that, next year we
may have close to a full orchestra's worth of
people playing.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've often heard it said that music can be
relaxing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But today I learned that it will never truly work
for me, as long as I'm with you. My pulse just
won't slow down enough...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? This felt like a date to you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wh-what are you talking about? What was "date-
like" about this? It's just a town event!
<PAGE>
No wonder you looked like you were having so
much fun. So it wasn't the music at all, was it?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The songs they played today were all very
impressive. I can still hear them echoing in my
mind.
<PAGE>
You too? Well, they do say spouses get to a
point where they sometimes think the same
things. I guess this is one more way we're alike.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just heard someone mention they wanted their
children to learn how to play an instrument.
<PAGE>
What do you think? Me, I think it'd be a good
thing for a child, if they're willing to learn.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I know it's a little early to think about that, but it
is an issue that may come up someday, so I
thought I'd ask your opinion.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's been forever since I last came to a concert. I
really enjoyed myself today.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The music was wonderful. I'm so glad I had a
chance to come listen to it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>What a splendid performance! When I was
young, I took a few piano lessons. Now I wish I
had kept with it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Aah, to give yourself over to an afternoon of
beautiful music...! What splendid bliss!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What did you think of today's concert? I hope
you enjoyed it.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad today's performance was an enjoyable
one. We will be having another concert next
year, so I hope you'll come again.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's concert was great! Everyone did a bang-
up job...and I'm not just saying that because my
daughter was performing.
<PAGE>
There were a few spots that made me wince a
little, but overall it was really relaxing. I enjoyed
it.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a great concert. I know I'm her dad,
but I thought Lillie played especially well.
<PAGE>
Maybe I should have Melanie start learning an
instrument, too.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's concert was fun! My sister did a really
good job! She's always practicing at home. ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What did you think of my sister's playing? She's
really good, right? I want to be able to play an
instrument like that someday!
<PAGE>
Maybe I should ask her to teach me.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a fabulous concert. Everyone was so
good, I just couldn't hold back my cheers for an
encore.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It must be nice to be able to play an instrument.
I'm a little jealous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I can belt out a tune in the shower, sure, but it's
not something I'm good enough to do in front of
an audience.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>HEY! Don't agree with me so quickly!

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is the concert over? Oh, good. I fell asleep right
at the beginning, so I didn't hear much at all.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Listening to nice music is so relaxing that I can't
help but drift off. When I'm asleep in the middle,
that's the sign of a great concert.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's concert was lovely. Everyone gave a
performance that'd give professional musicians a
run for their money.

<FACE_JONAS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've always been fond of good music. I mostly
keep to my record collection at home, but I'm
glad I got to hear a live performance today.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
